mapper.select: SELECT pam.project_apply_member_status AS applyStatus, pb.project_board_title AS projectBoardTitle, pb.project_board_content AS projectBoardContent, pb.project_board_head_count AS projectBoardHeadCount, pb.project_board_img_url AS projectBoardImgUrl, pb.project_board_start_date AS projectBoardStartDate, pb.project_board_end_date AS projectBoardEndDate, pb.project_start_date AS projectStartDate, pb.project_end_date AS projectEndDate FROM tbl_project_apply_member pam JOIN tbl_project_board pb ON pam.project_board_seq = pb.project_board_seq WHERE pam.user_seq = #{userSeq}
